description: It`s the first machine in the mass produced series of the R-1, the Arblade, that Mao Industries developed. Its performance is high, though the transformation mechanism, the T-Link system, and all other special features that the R-1 has have been omitted. It`s not counted as one of the R series, and the plans to mass produce this unit are already in planning thanks to this prototypes data.
name: PTX-014-1~3 R-Blade
